text:
[Verse]
Walking through the raindrops
Hearts are feeling high
Dancing in the puddles
Underneath the sky

[Verse 2]
Hands are intertwined tight
Moving with the beat
Splashing in the moonlight
Laughter in the street

[Chorus]
Love in the rain
Feeling so alive
Love in the rain
With you by my side

[Verse 3]
Footsteps in the water
Echoes in the night
Whispers in the darkness
Everything feels right

[Bridge]
Dreaming in the rainfall
Magic in the air
Every drop a moment
Every moment shared

[Chorus]
Love in the rain
Feeling so alive
Love in the rain
With you by my side
title: Love in the Rain
